text: Nde kha gava gangiap, nde kha ndɨkndɨga mbuav ki thi? Nza wari ga nzuav gorav kha buni khergiap nde ndi mbai. Ne maaŋ muuŋgi fhuvara. Nza Krais phorga havhargiap, nza Fhe Bakɨme nɨman mba buni nzuai. Nde guigira nan kɨvntogi guari. Nza kha mbui bigi, nta za nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨgi havhargirga.
